query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comet_vision_analyses (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  url VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(500),
  num_screenshots INT DEFAULT 0,
  num_components INT DEFAULT 0,
  num_colors INT DEFAULT 0,
  layout_type VARCHAR(100),
  dom_structure TEXT,
  computed_styles TEXT,
  visual_patterns TEXT,
  analyzer_version VARCHAR(50),
  status ENUM('pendente', 'concluido', 'erro') DEFAULT 'pendente',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX url_idx (url(255)),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX created_at_idx (createdAt)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comet_vision_screenshots (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_id INT NOT NULL,
  file_path TEXT NOT NULL,
  width INT,
  height INT,
  section VARCHAR(100),
  scroll_position INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX analysis_id_idx (analysis_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comet_vision_validations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_id INT NOT NULL,
  url_original VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL,
  url_gerada VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL,
  similaridade_geral INT NOT NULL,
  ssim_score INT,
  color_similarity INT,
  layout_similarity INT,
  threshold INT DEFAULT 90,
  aprovado INT DEFAULT 0,
  diff_image_path TEXT,
  observacoes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX analysis_id_idx (analysis_id),
  INDEX aprovado_idx (aprovado),
  INDEX created_at_idx (createdAt)
);
